api-reference.title: API Reference
api-reference.description: Complete reference for all API endpoints in the Ethereum Server API.

configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.description: This guide covers all configuration options for the Ethereum Server API.

curl-examples.title: Curl Examples
curl-examples.description: Command-line examples for testing the Ethereum Server API using curl.

ethereum-endpoints.title: Ethereum Endpoints
ethereum-endpoints.description: Detailed documentation for Ethereum-related API endpoints including signature verification and ENS operations.

face-recognition-endpoints.title: Face Recognition Endpoints
face-recognition-endpoints.description: Detailed documentation for face detection and recognition capabilities using computer vision and machine learning.

image-storage-endpoints.title: Image Storage Endpoints
image-storage-endpoints.description: Detailed documentation for image upload and storage using Akave O3 decentralized storage.

installation.title: Installation
installation.description: This guide will help you install and set up the Ethereum Server API on your system.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Welcome to the Ethereum Server API documentation! This comprehensive Node.js server provides powerful capabilities for Ethereum signature verification, ENS lookup, decentralized image storage via Akave O3, and face recognition.

usage-examples.title: Usage Examples
usage-examples.description: Practical examples demonstrating how to use the Ethereum Server API in real-world scenarios.
